segments.text: I observe the kitchen setup with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's flowing out, soaking the counter and floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on her plate, ignoring the entire spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how the water's ruining the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait nearby, probably next to get wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, a boy climbs the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is right there, full and tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to get a handful while balancing that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister watches eagerly, hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like they're having a secret fun time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden, all peaceful outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the mess inside bothers me; it's so unnecessary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids might slip on the wet floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing could end in tears instead of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR
